des: Create the .mcp_server_settings.json file in the data directory. You can select an existing MCP service below or add a new one yourself.
We will continue to test and supplement useful MCP services later; everyone is welcome to contribute.
Remember to delete comment lines. The des property is for description only and will not be parsed.
The des and link properties are just for explaining the installation method and viewing the original links, they are not mandatory.
Currently, two modes are supported: stdio/sse.
